content.raw:
This fixed it for me on OSX.

```
diff --git a/examples/plugin/gui_system_plugin/CMakeLists.txt b/examples/plugin/gui_system_plugin/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/examples/plugin/gui_system_plugin/CMakeLists.txt
+++ b/examples/plugin/gui_system_plugin/CMakeLists.txt
@@ -10,3 +10,3 @@ set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
 
-find_package(ignition-gazebo2 REQUIRED)
+find_package(ignition-gazebo2 REQUIRED COMPONENTS gui)
 
@@ -19,3 +19,3 @@ add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} SHARED
 target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME}
-  PRIVATE ignition-gazebo2::ignition-gazebo2
+  PRIVATE ignition-gazebo2::gui
 )
```
content.html:
This fixed it for me on OSX.

diff --git a/examples/plugin/gui_system_plugin/CMakeLists.txt b/examples/plugin/gui_system_plugin/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/examples/plugin/gui_system_plugin/CMakeLists.txt
+++ b/examples/plugin/gui_system_plugin/CMakeLists.txt
@@ -10,3 +10,3 @@ set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)

-find_package(ignition-gazebo2 REQUIRED)
+find_package(ignition-gazebo2 REQUIRED COMPONENTS gui)

@@ -19,3 +19,3 @@ add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} SHARED
 target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME}
-  PRIVATE ignition-gazebo2::ignition-gazebo2
+  PRIVATE ignition-gazebo2::gui
 )
